title: How to Get Money Faster in Smashy Road: Wanted

steps.headline: Start your run.
steps.description: Stay in the middle of the road, because that is where the money appears on the road.

steps.headline: Go to airports, military bases, raceways, and construction sites.
steps.description: These areas can be found off the road.

steps.headline: Do not accidentally crash into buildings while grinding, especially with small vehicles.
Get the Money Man or The Beast.
steps.description: These cars give you 5x money for each piece of money you collect. You must have a vast amount of game money to get legendaries, or you can us real money to buy the legendaries. If you do plan on using real money, it is highly advised that you get The Beast rather than the Money Man. The Beast has more speed and health than the Money Man.

steps.headline: Follow the regular Grinding method.
steps.description: Stay in the middle of the road, and move when about to crash.

text: Grinding (Without The Beast\/Money Man) Start your run. Stay in the middle of the road, because that is where the money appears on the road. Go to airports, military bases, raceways, and construction sites. These areas can be found off the road. Do not accidentally crash into buildings while grinding, especially with small vehicles.  Grinding (With The Beast\/Money Man) Get the Money Man or The Beast. These cars give you 5x money for each piece of money you collect. You must have a vast amount of game money to get legendaries, or you can us real money to buy the legendaries. If you do plan on using real money, it is highly advised that you get The Beast rather than the Money Man. The Beast has more speed and health than the Money Man. Follow the regular Grinding method. Stay in the middle of the road, and move when about to crash.
